article_text: ObamaCare is failing because people won’t “pay for pricey coverage they don’t need,” writes Andy Puzder , CEO of CKE Restaurants, which includes the Hardee’s and Carl’s Jr. burger chains. “It makes sense for healthy young people to pay a penalty rather than purchase the insurance. And in 2015 that’s what 6.6 million people did, according to the IRS.” And “there is another problem: It is easy to avoid or limit exposure to the penalty with some simple tax planning, as there are 30 different exemptions (which 12 million people...

article_summary:
“It makes sense for healthy young people to pay a penalty rather than purchase the insurance.
ObamaCare is failing because people won’t “pay for pricey coverage they don’t need,” writes Andy Puzder , CEO of CKE Restaurants, which includes the Hardee’s and Carl’s Jr. burger chains.
And in 2015 that’s what 6.6 million people did, according to the IRS.” And “there is another problem: It is easy to avoid or limit exposure to the penalty with some simple tax planning, as there are 30 different exemptions (which 12 million people...
